SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_BATCHLOCKINSERT
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Insert a row into BatchLock table
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Memphis
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
CREATE PROCEDURE USR_USP_BATCHLOCKINSERT -- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here @objectId uniqueidentifier, --Guid of the object/entity that is being locked: project, country, anything @timeStamp DateTime, --datetime value, kind of a timestamp @appUserId nvarchar(100) --userId of the person doing the batch AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON; INSERT INTO USR_BATCHLOCK ([ID] ,[LOCKED_TS] ,[USERID] ,[OBJECTID]) VALUES (newid() ,@timeStamp ,@appUserId ,@objectId )
END
